body:
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**area/converter**] Regression in 3.0.15: Duplicate reference error when processing Debezium events with nested schemas [#6757](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6757)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**area/serdes**][**area/protobuf**] Problem with Protobuf schema validation in SerDe [#6749](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6749)
- [**closed**] kafkasql storage does not work (ApicurioRegistry3) [#6742](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6742)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/high**][**area/rest/ccompat**] Mismatch in Version Numbers Between /apis/registry/v3 and /apis/ccompat/v7 Endpoints [#6741](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6741)
- [**type/question**][**priority/normal**][**area/operator**] unable to start apicurio-registry-operator [#6730](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6730)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/low**][**area/rest**][**area/rest/ccompat**] Extra "references" Field Returned by Apicurio Registry v7 ccompat API [#6715](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6715)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**area/maven-plugin**] Maven autoRefs for AsyncAPI + Avro inconsistent groupId for avro references [#6711](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6711)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**area/maven-plugin**] Maven autoRefs for Avro does not resolve relative field types (not fully qualified) [#6710](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6710)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/high**][**area/serdes**][**area/sdk**] How to configure TLS certificates in Kafka Avro SerDes client [#6705](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6705)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/high**][**area/ui**] Edit Draft button is shown for a non-draft artifact version [#6698](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6698)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**area/ui**] Breadcrumb not working [#6696](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6696)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/high**][**area/ui**] UI: error when searching for Versions by State=Draft on the Search page [#6693](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6693)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/low**][**area/ui**] Cannot access schema registry API documentation when hosted at a base path other than `/` [#6692](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6692)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**area/auth**][**version/3.x**] Logout Error when UI oidc scope is configured [#6611](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6611)
- [**type/enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**version/3.x**] Support for Dynamic log level [#6584](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6584)
- [**type/bug**][**priority/normal**][**area/rest**][**version/3.x**] OpenAPI Apicurio Backend must respect the contract on SearchedGroup schema [#6537](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6537)
- [**type/enhancement**][**priority/normal**][**area/rest/ccompat**] Implement format query parameter in ccompat API [#6129](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/6129)
